EmailTemplate.name: Global_Webinar_PHD & Aridhia_Q314.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder: You are registered for our Webinar tomorrow, 8/27
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
A friendly reminder of your registration for our webinar "Enabling Personalized Healthcare with Biomedical Informatics" tomorrow, August 27, 2014 at 8:00 AM PDT/4:00PM GMT+1. Please see the event details below:
Date: Wednesday, August 27, 2014 Time: 8:00AM PDT (San Francisco)/4:00PM GMT+1 (London) Event Number: 663 390 092 Join the Webex <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=663390092> Teleconferencing Information: This webinar will be streaming live, however dial-in options are available:
- Global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/globalcallin.php?serviceType=EC&ED=112132122&tollFree=1> - Access code: 663 390 092
{{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
